paragraphs.p1: Here are the technologies I am used to. You can hover or click on the cards to discover the details.
paragraphs.p2: The animated percentage circles on these cards are more about visual engagement than precise skill measurement. They serve as an interactive, eye-catching element, offering a glimpse into my familiarity with various technologies and my keen interest on interactive UI designs.
paragraphs.p3: I am always down for a challenge in another tech though !
